title: DAX Fridays #189: Which function is faster to count rows: COUNT OR COUNTROWS?
excerpt: Which DAX function will count the rows of a table faster: COUNT or COUNTROWS?  Lets find out shall we?  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
